WorkItem.Description:
I've found another bug when I hit crit cap, it says i lose DPS if i increase my agility to a certain level.
Â 
Check the agility graph on the attached profile.

Comments.Message:
I'm assuming this is using 2.3.8 and not the latest unreleased code?

This is an already reported issue in 2.3.8.  We're releasing a new version very soon, which will have this fixed.

The bug occurs when your crit chance for an ability reaches 100% (which means you're also expertise/hit capped -- as arms this is easy to do, as Overpower cannot be dodged and has a +50% bonus chance).  Fury can also be affected if you somehow got Slam/HS/BT/WW to 100% crit chance through extreme crit gear and glyphs/talents.  

Any time you reach this point, DPS drops.  Agility, Crit Rating, Hit and Expertise can all be affected (expertise is less likely)
